Class GUI

java.lang.Object
GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Creates an interactive user interface of the Connect 4 game including buttons to end game, create a new game, and view the score board.
Version:
May 27, 2021

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GUI​(Connect4 c)
    Create a new GUI object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
    void play()
    Resets the board if user wants to play a new game.
    void tie()
    Creates pop up board if the game ends in a tie.
    void win()
    Creates a pop up board if a player has won the game.
